pageContext.claim: “The New Green Deal, okay, and it's got to be some kind of a joke. It's got to be -- they have to be kidding but, you know, I saw the senator from Hawaii [Mazie Hirono] … And they asked her about it, the New Green Deal. They said, how about that? And she goes, well, I'm in Hawaii and I understand they won't allow airplanes. And she said, it's hard for me but I will approve it anyway.”
pageContext.analysis: The video of this interview with Fox News shows that Hirono was joking. Trump describes her as supporting the Green New Deal even though it would ban air travel and hamper the journey to Hawaii. The resolution does not ban air travel and Hirono did not say she supported the plan even though it would hamper trips to Hawaii.
